mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `restaurant` (restaurant_name, restaurant_address, description, restaurant_image_url, lng, lat, restaurateur_id) VALUES (#{restaurantName}, #{restaurantAddress}, #{description}, #{restaurantImageUrl}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{restaurateurId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, restaurant_name, restaurant_address, description, restaurant_image_url, lng, lat, restaurateur_id FROM `restaurant`
SELECT id, restaurant_name, restaurant_address, description, restaurant_image_url, lng, lat, restaurateur_id FROM `restaurant` WHERE restaurateur_id = #{restaurateurId} LIMIT 1
SELECT id, restaurant_name, restaurant_address, description, restaurant_image_url, lng, lat, restaurateur_id FROM `restaurant` WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
